description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3jmo","text":"A protocol to generate Influenza A Virus sequences from RNA extracts in under 24 hours with less than two hours of hands on time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ce54a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq1b","text":"Based on:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1aq3","text":"King, J., Harder, T., Beer, M., \u0026 Pohlmann, A. (2020). Rapid multiplex MinION nanopore sequencing workflow for Influenza A viruses.BMC Infectious Diseases,20(1). https://doi.org/10.1186/s12879-020-05367-y","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":131,"length":23},{"style":"italic","offset":155,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oj8f","text":"Zhou, B., Donnelly, M. E., Scholes, D. T., st. George, K., Hatta, M., Kawaoka, Y., \u0026 Wentworth, D. E. (2009). Single-Reaction Genomic Amplification Accelerates Sequencing and Vaccine Production for Classical and Swine Origin Human Influenza A Viruses.Journal of Virology,83(19), 10309–10313. https://doi.org/10.1128/jvi.01109-09","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":251,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":271,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hm9m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h8bb","text":"Tested with up to 20 RNA extracts from samples per run, alongside:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2mv0","text":"Negative control of nuclease-free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e38r","text":"Positive control of H1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l6bu","text":"Positive control of H3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e2he","text":"Positive control of lambda phage, introduced at barcoding stage (i.e. not amplified), as an assessment of barcode crosstalk","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmu0t","text":"Prepare up to 20 RNA extracts from samples plus:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31m8g","text":"Negative control of nuclease-free water ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2chre","text":"Positive control of H1N1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qrq6","text":"Positive control of H3N2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11nd1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs5r0","text":"If samples previously frozen, mix by briefly vortexing and pulse spin to collect liquid. Keep samples on cool block at all times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tc1","text":"In the template-free pre-PCR hood, prepare the following master mixes in Eppendorf DNA LoBind tubes, mix thoroughly by pipetting, and pulse spin to collect liquid at the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gv4k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hbh0","text":"Pool {"blocks":[{"key":"8f3mc","text":"In the template-free pre-PCR hood, aliquot   of Pool A master mix into in   8 well PCR strip-tubes, and   of Pool B into a seperate  8 well PCR strip tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":104,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":132,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"16d28","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9.5","error":false,"guid":"3A7215F0230411EDAD86635B4D450153","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.2","error":false,"guid":"F1E1E2B08C6D11EDB668815D0B6A92DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9.5","error":false,"guid":"16D56B508C6E11EDB668815D0B6A92DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.2","error":false,"guid":"192241808C6E11EDB668815D0B6A92DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"111fm","text":"In the post-PCR lab, incubate the reaction as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aaoo0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aklis","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"akosj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Step","Temperature","Time","Cycles"],"colWidths":["126",100,100,100],"data":[["RT step","55","30 minutes","1"],["Denaturation","94","2 minutes","1"],["Denaturation","94","30 seconds","5"],["Annealing","45","30 seconds","5"],["Extension","68","3 minutes","5"],["Denaturation","94","30 seconds","31"],["Annealing","57","30 seconds","31"],["Extension","68","3 minutes","31"],["Final Extension","68","3 minutes","1"],["Hold","4","-","-"]],"guid":"65297DA0230511EDB478593DEDB15AA5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["RT step","55","30 minutes","1"],["Denaturation","94","2 minutes","1"],["Denaturation","94","30 seconds","5"],["Annealing","45","30 seconds","5"],["Extension","68","3 minutes","5"],["Denaturation","94","30 seconds","31"],["Annealing","57","30 seconds","31"],["Extension","68","3 minutes","31"],["Final Extension","68","3 minutes","1"],["Hold","4","-","-"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l2bv","text":"In the template pre-PCR hood, transfer   of sample into the corresponding well of both Pool A and Pool B. Mix by pipetting each well up and down. Spin down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a2f0b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"517918A0230611EDB478593DEDB15AA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buhf8","text":"Briefly spin down the Barcode reaction product to collect the liquid at the bottom of the wells prior to opening.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqt78","text":"Thaw the Sequencing Buffer II (SBII), Loading Beads II (LBII), Flush Tether (FLT) and Flush Buffer (FB) at room temperature before mixing the reagents by vortexing, and spin down the SBII and FLT at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9r6d7","text":"To prepare the flow cell priming mix, add   of thawed and mixed Flush Tether (FLT) directly to the tube of thawed and mixed Flush Buffer (FB), and mix by vortexing at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4n8on","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"1FDFDA90230B11EDB478593DEDB15AA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"elkio","text":"On the GridION Mk1, place flow cell and perform flow cell check. Proceed if more than \u003e800 pores.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a9r01","text":"Slide the priming port cover clockwise to open the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g4mh","text":"After opening the priming port, check for a small air bubble under the cover. Draw back a small volume to remove any bubbles (a few μl):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"deor5","text":"Set a P1000 pipette to 200 μl","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgm78","text":"Insert the tip into the priming port","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gjih","text":"Turn the wheel until the dial shows 220-230 ul, to draw back 20-30 ul, or until you can see a small volume of buffer entering the pipette tip","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mjk","text":"Note:Visually check that there is continuous buffer from the priming port across the sensor array.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9m0h","text":"Load   of the priming mix into the flow cell via the priming port, again by turning wheel of pipette and not by pressing on button, avoiding the introduction of air bubbles. Wait for 5 minutes. During this time, prepare the library for loading by following the steps below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1q74g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"27278FF0230B11EDB478593DEDB15AA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"doctr","text":"Thoroughly mix the contents of the Loading Beads II (LBII) by pipetting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dm3qj","text":"In a new tube, prepare the library for loading as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ihlr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9llg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a857p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Reagent","Volume"],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["SBII","37.5 uL"],["LBII","25.5 uL"],["DNA library","12 uL"],["Total","75 uL"]],"guid":"BAF8DC30230A11EDB478593DEDB15AA5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["SBII","37.5 uL"],["LBII","25.5 uL"],["DNA library","12 uL"],["Total","75 uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cceer","text":"Complete the flow cell priming:\n    1. Gently lift the SpotON sample port cover to make the SpotON sample port accessible.\n    2. Load  of the priming mix into the flow cell via the priming port (not the SpotON sample port), avoiding the introduction of air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":196,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"883o4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"17403650230B11EDB478593DEDB15AA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97mb8","text":"Mix the prepared library gently by pipetting up and down just prior to loading.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pfge","text":"Add  of sample to the flow cell via the SpotON sample port in a dropwise fashion. Ensure each drop flows into the port before adding the next.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"75","error":false,"guid":"48FBFE40230B11EDB478593DEDB15AA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asqsl","text":"Gently replace the SpotON sample port cover, making sure the bung enters the SpotON port, close the priming port and replace the MinION device lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"460oh","text":"When starting the sequencing run, ensure the following settings are selected","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18e4k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frb7h","text":"Rapid Barcoding Kit 96 (SQK-RBK110.96)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aupe0","text":"High accuracy base calling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pq3","text":"Enable barcoding","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djc5t","text":"Mid-read barcoding filtering on","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6icb1","text":"Over-ride minimum barcode score 60","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kk27","text":"Fastq size set to 250 reads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4t2v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcprf","text":"Sequencing performed on MinKNOW version 22.10.7 with guppy_basecaller 6.3.9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u563","text":"Pool   from each sample into a 2ml Eppendorf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7aot","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"CD39D340237811EDB478593DEDB15AA5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1g2m3","text":"Vortex pooled samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
